Subject: VisualAge v3.5 and NullPointerExceptions
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: Gary Murphy <glm@...>


I have am trying to use JUnit under VisualAge for Java v3.5 to test some
3270 screen-scraping code using IBM Personal Communications and the HACL
class libraries.  At the end of the run, I get NullPointerException's on
all of the run threads.  The stack trace is

    com.ibm.uvm.jdk12.AttachHandler.run()
    java.lang.Thread.run()

The test has this problem with both the AWT and the console version of
the TestRunner

I don't have the souce to that code, so I don't have any insight as to
what is going on.   It doesn't appear to be anything that JUnit is using
explicitly.  My other non-HACL tests seem to run OK.

Any ideas?
subject: VisualAge v3.5 and NullPointerExceptions
